transforming_reservation: Transforming the way the world makes reservations
about_reservio: Reservio is a leading platform dedicated to simplifying the reservation process for businesses and customers alike. Our mission is to provide a seamless, user-friendly experience that saves time and enhances satisfaction.
founding_year: Founded in 2025, Reservio has grown to serve thousands of users worldwide, offering innovative solutions for restaurants, hotels, events, and more.
hazem_description: Ensures the optimal quality of the application
kareem_description: Ensuring exceptional customer experiences every day.
kerollos_description: Ensuring exceptional customer experiences every day.
nourhan_description: Ensuring exceptional customer experiences every day.
nareman_description: Leading our vision of transforming the reservation industry.
innovation_description: Leading the future of reservations with cutting-edge technology and creative solutions.
excellence_description: Delivering exceptional service quality and reliability in every interaction.
trust_description: Building lasting relationships through transparency and reliability.
mission_description: At Reservio, we are committed to revolutionizing the way reservations are made. Our goal is to empower businesses with tools that streamline operations and delight customers with effortless booking experiences.
about_reservio_footer: Transforming the way the world makes reservations. We provide seamless booking experiences for businesses and customers alike.
venue_approved: Your venue request for {venueName} has been approved.
venue_rejected: Your venue request for {venueName} has been rejected. Please check your email for details.
booking_canceled: Your booking for {venueName} on {date} has been canceled.
new_booking: New booking for {venueName}! You've received {amount} EGP in your wallet.
faq_subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Reservio
what_is_reservio_answer: Reservio is a platform that simplifies the reservation process for businesses and customers, offering seamless booking experiences for restaurants, hotels, events, and more.
is_reservio_free_answer: Reservio offers both free and premium plans. The free plan includes basic features, while the premium plan provides additional functionality.
how_to_make_reservation: How can I make a reservation?
how_to_make_reservation_answer: To make a reservation, search for the desired service, select a date and time, and provide your details. You will receive a confirmation once the booking is complete.
payment_methods_answer: Reservio accepts major credit cards, debit cards, and PayPal. Some service providers may offer additional payment options.
contact_support: How can I contact customer support?
contact_support_answer: You can contact our customer support team via email or through the Contact Us page on our website.
booking_history: Where can I find my booking history?
booking_history_answer: Your booking history is available in the Your Bookings section of your account dashboard.
booking_issues: What if I encounter an issue during booking?
booking_issues_answer: If you encounter any issues during the booking process, please contact our support team immediately for assistance.
